caption.p: LEfSe analysis showing the significant differences at different fungal taxonomic levels among SC, TC, and MC communities in 0–15 cm soil layer ( a, b, d) and 15–30 cm soil layer ( c, e). The colors of red, green, and yellow correspond to the SC, TC, and MC communities, respectively. Abbreviation: p—phylum; c—class; o—order; f—family; g—genus; Phia_dimor—Phialemonium_dimorphosporum; and Spo_sp_1_CMW9492—Sporothrix_sp_1_CMW9492.
